description:
The day starts with a huge infraction of attendance. One of the trainees is not here, but we go on without her. The girls are marched into the basement stripped, scrubbed, and hosed down. I wanted to make sure that these girls understand the basics of personal hygiene.
Next on to some team building activities with heavy labor. It takes a bit for them to get it right, but with time they do a decent job. They are then tested on their ability to please a woman, and orgasm control. One is dismissed and sent on her way.
title: Day 1 March Dirty Trainess Make Dirty Slaves
